meta.primary_objective: Deliver a secure, mobile-friendly Codex web app on Windows + WSL with Tailscale-only remote access, terminal support, and strong reliability gates.

definition_of_done_global: Code merged to main branch with review approval.
All required automated tests for the ticket pass in CI.
No open P0/P1 defects linked to the ticket.
Operational notes or docs updated if behavior changed.
workflow.phase_advance_rule: A phase can advance only when all required tickets are done and the phase gate test suites pass.

required_before_any_phase_close: no critical vulnerabilities in dependency scan

phases.name: Foundation
phases.goal: Establish repository structure, baseline services, and CI quality controls.

required_test_runs.name: foundation-ci
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: All commands return exit code 0.

required_test_runs.name: bootstrap-smoke
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Health endpoint responds 200 with expected JSON.

release_blockers: Missing env validation for required secrets.
Auth middleware not enforced on mutating endpoints.

tickets.title: Scaffold monorepo and baseline project structure
implementation_steps: Create workspace layout: apps/backend, apps/web, packages/shared, infra, docs.
Add root scripts for lint/typecheck/test/build.
Add baseline tsconfig and eslint/prettier config.

unit: Validate shared package exports compile via `pnpm -r typecheck`.
integration: Run `pnpm install` and `pnpm -r build` successfully from clean checkout.
manual: Verify `pnpm dev` boots backend and web concurrently.

acceptance_criteria: A new contributor can clone and run lint/typecheck/test without manual setup beyond documented prerequisites.

tickets.title: Implement environment and config validation layer
implementation_steps: Define strict schema for env vars (ports, secrets, allowed roots, auth settings).
Fail fast at startup on invalid/missing critical values.
Provide `.env.example` and config docs.
deliverables: Config loader module with schema validation.

unit: Test invalid port values, missing required secrets, malformed allowed roots.
integration: Start backend with valid env and expect success.
Start backend with invalid env and expect deterministic exit + clear error.
manual: Verify startup log redacts secret values.

acceptance_criteria: Backend cannot run with unsafe or malformed config.

tickets.title: Add baseline observability and structured logging
implementation_steps: Introduce structured JSON logging with request correlation IDs.
Add log levels and redact policy for secrets.
Expose basic metrics endpoint for service health stats.

unit: Validate redaction behavior for secret-like keys.
integration: Call health endpoint and assert correlation ID appears in logs.
Assert metrics endpoint is reachable and parseable.

acceptance_criteria: All API requests emit structured logs with correlation IDs.

tickets.title: Implement session-based auth and security middleware baseline
implementation_steps: Implement login/session issuance for single-user mode.
Add middleware for auth checks on mutating endpoints.
Configure secure cookies and CSRF token primitives.

unit: Token generation/validation tests.
Session expiration handling tests.
integration: Unauthenticated POST requests return 401/403.
Authenticated flow succeeds with valid CSRF token.
security: Verify cookie flags: HttpOnly, Secure, SameSite.

acceptance_criteria: No mutating API route can be used without valid session and CSRF.

tickets.title: Set up CI pipeline with quality gates
implementation_steps: Configure CI jobs for lint, typecheck, unit, integration, and dependency scans.
Enforce branch protection required checks.
Publish test reports and coverage artifacts.
deliverables: Coverage and test summary artifact upload.

integration: Trigger CI on PR and confirm all required jobs execute.
Introduce failing test and verify CI blocks merge.

acceptance_criteria: Main branch merge is blocked unless required checks pass.

phases.name: Core Codex Integration
phases.goal: Enable stable app-server handshake, workspace operations, threads, turns, and streaming UI.

required_test_runs.name: app-server-contract-tests
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Handshake, request-response correlation, and notification routing tests all pass.

required_test_runs.name: mobile-chat-e2e-smoke
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: User can open workspace, start thread, send turn, and receive streaming output.

required_test_runs.name: crash-recovery-smoke
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: If app-server subprocess is killed mid-turn, manager recovers and reports error state cleanly.

release_blockers: Any lost or duplicated streamed delta in a normal turn.

tickets.title: Implement app-server process manager with strict initialize handshake
implementation_steps: Spawn `codex app-server --listen stdio://` per workspace context.
Implement initialize -> initialized handshake sequence.
Implement request ID correlation map and timeout handling.
Handle server notifications and server-initiated requests.
deliverables: Typed protocol adapters for key v2 methods.

unit: Handshake order validation tests.
Request timeout/cancellation tests.
ID collision and stale response handling tests.
integration: Real subprocess test for initialize success path.
Negative test: call method before initialize should raise protocol error.

acceptance_criteria: Manager handles startup, RPC, and shutdown without leaked processes.

tickets.title: Build workspace CRUD and filesystem boundary enforcement
implementation_steps: Create workspace APIs and SQLite persistence.
Implement canonicalization + allowlist root checks.
Reject symlink traversal outside allowed roots.

unit: Path canonicalization and traversal attack tests.
Symlink escape rejection tests.
integration: Create/list/delete workspace via API with auth.
Attempt forbidden path and verify rejection.
security: Fuzz path payloads (`..`, mixed separators, encoded traversal).

acceptance_criteria: Only approved filesystem roots can be registered as workspaces.

tickets.title: Implement thread lifecycle API wrappers
implementation_steps: Implement wrapper methods for thread/start, thread/resume, thread/list, thread/read, thread/archive.
Normalize thread metadata into app DB.
Add REST endpoints for frontend consumption.

unit: Response normalization mapping tests.
integration: Create/resume/archive flow against live app-server subprocess.
Idempotency checks on repeated archive/read operations.

acceptance_criteria: Thread operations are stable and state-consistent across backend restarts.

tickets.title: Implement turn APIs and real-time event streaming bridge
implementation_steps: Implement turn/start, turn/steer, turn/interrupt wrappers.
Bridge app-server notifications to frontend WS events.
Guarantee ordered event delivery per turn stream.
deliverables: WebSocket event broker for item/delta lifecycle.

unit: Event ordering and dedupe logic tests.
integration: Stream a long response and verify reconstructed message matches final item.
Interrupt in-flight turn and verify terminal status is `interrupted`.
performance: Stream 5 concurrent turns (test harness) and verify no dropped WS frames.

acceptance_criteria: Frontend receives complete ordered stream for turns under normal network conditions.

tickets.title: Deliver mobile-first chat UI with reconnect support
implementation_steps: Build mobile workspace/thread selector UI.
Render item timeline and deltas incrementally.
Implement reconnect and stream resubscribe behavior.

e2e_mobile: Open app on mobile viewport, create thread, send prompt, receive response.
Simulate network drop and verify automatic reconnect + no UI crash.
manual: Validate touch target sizing and keyboard behavior on phone.

acceptance_criteria: Core chat workflow is usable on phone with resilient reconnect behavior.

phases.name: UI Architecture and Design Foundation
phases.goal: Stabilize frontend architecture and establish a coherent visual system before deeper feature work.
entry_criteria: Current login/workspace/thread/turn flow is manually verifiable.

required_test_runs.name: ui-foundation-quality
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: All frontend quality commands pass with no regressions in existing auth/chat flows.

required_test_runs.name: ui-foundation-manual-smoke
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Manual smoke confirms login -> workspace -> thread -> turn workflow remains intact.

release_blockers: Composer focus loss during event stream updates.
Any full-page rerender on each incoming websocket event.

tickets.title: Refactor web app into app shell, feature modules, and explicit state boundaries
implementation_steps: Split current web UI into shell, sidebar/navigation, timeline, and composer feature modules.
Introduce typed state store boundaries for session, workspace, thread, and stream state.
Remove render-time coupling that causes whole-view rerenders on event updates.
deliverables: State container interfaces with unit coverage for core reducers/selectors.

unit: Reducer and selector tests for workspace/thread/event state transitions.
integration: Open thread, stream responses, and verify only relevant components rerender.
manual: Type continuously in composer while stream events arrive and verify no focus loss.

acceptance_criteria: UI structure supports incremental feature additions without rewriting root render flow.

tickets.title: Implement design tokens and responsive layout scaffolding
implementation_steps: Define design tokens for typography, spacing, radii, color semantics, and motion timing.
Implement mobile-first breakpoints and shell layout zones (header/navigation/timeline/composer).
Standardize button/input/card variants used in chat and workspace controls.
deliverables: Responsive shell layout with shared UI primitives.

integration: Visual regression snapshots at phone, tablet, and desktop widths.
manual: Validate touch target sizing and keyboard-safe layout at ~390px viewport width.

acceptance_criteria: UI has consistent visual language across workspace list, thread panel, timeline, and composer.

tickets.title: Define typed event normalization and visibility policy
implementation_steps: Define canonical frontend event model for message, reasoning, tool, status, and error events.
Implement filter/collapse policy for noisy internal events (e.g., skills update spam).
Document mapping from backend websocket payloads to timeline-ready UI items.
deliverables: Event visibility policy doc aligned with timeline renderer requirements.

unit: Payload-to-view-model mapping tests for all supported event types.
integration: Replay captured event streams and verify deterministic normalized output ordering.

acceptance_criteria: Timeline pipeline can render meaningful cards without leaking low-value protocol noise by default.

phases.name: Conversation Experience Quality
phases.goal: Make timeline and composer behavior resilient and readable under sustained event streaming.

required_test_runs.name: timeline-stream-resilience
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Streaming timeline remains responsive and ordered under bursty event conditions.

required_test_runs.name: composer-stability-suite
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Composer draft, focus, and send/interrupt controls stay stable during long-running turns.

release_blockers: Auto-scroll forces user to bottom while reading history.
Long responses cause visible input lag or dropped keystrokes.

tickets.title: Build typed timeline renderer with expandable cards
implementation_steps: Render separate card components for message, reasoning, tool, status, and error event classes.
Support expand/collapse for raw payload details without overwhelming default view.
Add stable keying and incremental append behavior for streamed timeline updates.
deliverables: Card interaction patterns for compact and expanded detail modes.

unit: Renderer selection tests by normalized event type.
integration: Mixed event stream renders in correct order with expected card variants.
manual: Expand/collapse payload details during active stream without layout jitter.

acceptance_criteria: Timeline defaults to a readable high-signal view while preserving access to full details.

tickets.title: Harden composer draft, focus retention, and interrupt UX
implementation_steps: Separate draft input state from stream render state to avoid unintended resets.
Keep focus and cursor position stable across incoming event batches.
Add explicit busy timer and interrupt affordance with reliable disabled/enabled states.
deliverables: Composer state module and refined controls.
Busy/interrupt interaction patterns with clear status feedback.

unit: Composer state machine tests for idle, sending, streaming, interrupted, and error states.
integration: Rapid send attempts, interrupt action, and reconnect scenarios preserve draft integrity.

acceptance_criteria: User can type and control turn execution reliably during high event throughput.

tickets.title: Implement event batching and smart auto-scroll behavior
implementation_steps: Batch render updates on a short cadence to reduce churn under event storms.
Track user scroll intent and only auto-scroll when user is near latest content.
Add visible "jump to latest" control when user inspects older timeline content.
deliverables: Batched event queue in frontend state pipeline.

unit: Batch queue flush and ordering invariants.
integration: Replay high-frequency streams and confirm smooth scrolling plus no forced snap-to-bottom.
manual: Scroll upward during active stream and verify user stays in reading position until opting back.

acceptance_criteria: Timeline remains performant and user-controlled during long or noisy streams.

phases.name: Workspace and Thread UX Polish
phases.goal: Make project navigation, context switching, and recovery paths intuitive on desktop and mobile.

required_test_runs.name: workspace-thread-e2e
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Workspace/thread switching, retry flows, and context labels are reliable.

required_test_runs.name: mobile-ux-validation
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Mobile navigation remains usable with soft keyboard open and active streams.

release_blockers: Active workspace/thread context is ambiguous in main chat view.
Recovery from API errors requires full page refresh or relogin.

tickets.title: Upgrade workspace and thread navigation with status-rich cards
implementation_steps: Redesign workspace/thread list items to include active, running, archived, and error states.
Expose last activity metadata and quick context cues in navigation panes.
Add deterministic active-state styling to prevent context confusion.
deliverables: Navigation card components with state chips.
Context metadata mapping from existing backend data.

integration: Switch between multiple threads/workspaces and verify active context is always visible.
manual: Confirm quick re-entry into recent threads without losing current composer draft.

acceptance_criteria: Users can identify and switch context confidently without accidental actions.

tickets.title: Improve turn/action error handling and retry affordances
implementation_steps: Standardize inline error states for failed login/session/workspace/thread/turn actions.
Add one-click retry patterns with safe idempotency guardrails in UI state.
Provide actionable failure copy that includes next step and affected context.
deliverables: Unified error boundary and action feedback patterns.
Retry-capable UI action wrappers for key user flows.

unit: Error state reducers and retry action guards.
integration: Inject backend failures and verify recoverability without hard refresh.

acceptance_criteria: Primary user flows recover gracefully from transient failures.

tickets.title: Run dedicated mobile polish and usability certification pass
implementation_steps: Tune viewport and keyboard behavior for phone widths and long timelines.
Audit touch target sizes and gesture conflicts for core actions.
Execute manual UX checklist and record defects with severity tags.
deliverables: UX certification checklist report for UI program closeout.

e2e_mobile: Login -> workspace select -> thread start -> turn send -> interrupt -> reconnect flow on narrow viewport.
manual: Soft keyboard open/close does not hide composer controls or primary action buttons.

acceptance_criteria: Core PocketCodex workflows feel reliable and ergonomic on phone screens.

phases.name: Multi-Workspace + Approvals
phases.goal: Support concurrent workspace sessions and robust approval workflows.

required_test_runs.name: multi-workspace-concurrency
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Three workspaces can run isolated turns without event cross-talk.

required_test_runs.name: approval-e2e
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Accept, decline, and timeout flows all behave correctly.

required_test_runs.name: state-recovery
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Service restarts preserve DB metadata and recover active workspace managers safely.

release_blockers: Approval request response mapped to wrong turn/item.

tickets.title: Implement multi-workspace process pool and lifecycle controls
implementation_steps: Create workspace manager registry with LRU shutdown for idle managers.
Add bounded process limits and queueing policy.
Add health probes for each manager.

unit: LRU and idle timeout behavior tests.
integration: Open 3+ workspaces and run independent turns concurrently.
Validate capped process behavior when max managers reached.

acceptance_criteria: Workspace sessions are isolated and managed within configured limits.

tickets.title: Implement approval center backend and UI
implementation_steps: Handle server requests for command execution approval, file change approval, and tool user input.
Build pending approvals queue in backend + frontend.
Support accept/decline and tool input submission with timeout behavior.

unit: Approval routing and timeout policy tests.
integration: Simulate command/file approval requests and verify correct response wiring.
e2e_mobile: User receives approval prompt, accepts, and sees successful completion.
User declines and sees declined terminal state.
security: Reject approval responses from unauthorized sessions.

acceptance_criteria: All approval request types are actionable from mobile and correctly correlated.

tickets.title: Persist thread/workspace metadata and sync jobs
implementation_steps: Finalize schema for workspaces/threads and migration strategy.
Add sync routine from app-server thread/list into local DB cache.
Track `updated_at`, archived state, and last active metadata.

unit: Repository CRUD tests.
Migration compatibility tests.
integration: Restart service and verify metadata remains consistent.

acceptance_criteria: Thread history is quickly browsable without inconsistency after restart.

tickets.title: Implement failure recovery and restart policies
implementation_steps: Add retry with exponential backoff/jitter for app-server process crashes.
Create degraded states and user-visible recovery messages.
Prevent restart storms with circuit breaker thresholds.

integration: Kill subprocess repeatedly and verify backoff progression.
Verify circuit breaker opens after configured failure threshold.
manual: Observe user-facing error banners for degraded workspace.

acceptance_criteria: Backend recovers from transient failures without uncontrolled restart loops.

tickets.title: Improve mobile UX for multi-workspace state and errors
implementation_steps: Add workspace status badges and queue indicators.
Add clear error/retry affordances for failed turns and approvals.
Persist last selected workspace/thread in client storage.

e2e_mobile: Switch across workspaces and verify context isolation in UI.
Trigger errors and verify retry path works.

acceptance_criteria: Users can reliably navigate multi-workspace flows on mobile without confusion.

phases.status_reason: Paused on 2026-02-10 for UI-first execution focus.

phases.name: Terminal Subsystem
phases.goal: Provide persistent and secure mobile terminal access with reconnect-safe behavior.

required_test_runs.name: terminal-e2e-mobile
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Create, attach, execute command, detach, and reattach flows pass.

required_test_runs.name: terminal-soak
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: No session loss, memory leak, or stuck I/O streams over soak duration.

required_test_runs.name: terminal-security-checks
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Unauthorized access to terminal routes is denied.

tickets.title: Implement tmux-backed terminal session manager
implementation_steps: Integrate tmux session creation/list/kill APIs.
Map sessions to workspace IDs with ownership checks.
Add persistent metadata in DB.

unit: Session mapping and ownership checks.
integration: Create/list/kill tmux session workflows.
Reattach to existing session after backend restart.

acceptance_criteria: Terminal sessions persist independently of browser connection.

tickets.title: Implement terminal WS protocol for input/output/resize
implementation_steps: Define WS message schema for terminal attach/input/output/resize/heartbeat.
Implement backpressure handling and output chunking.
Implement server-side idle timeout and heartbeat disconnect rules.

integration: Send command input and verify ordered output.
Resize terminal and verify dimensions apply.
performance: Burst output test (e.g., `yes | head -n 50000`) without WS crash.

acceptance_criteria: Terminal WS remains stable under normal and burst output workloads.

tickets.title: Build mobile terminal UI
implementation_steps: Integrate xterm-like mobile terminal rendering.
Add soft keyboard input controls and copy/paste handling.
Add reconnect and session picker UX.

e2e_mobile: Attach terminal, run commands, rotate viewport, continue session.
Disconnect network and verify reattach path.
manual: Validate keyboard behavior on iOS and Android browsers.

acceptance_criteria: Phone-based terminal interaction is practical for daily use.

tickets.title: Add terminal authorization and workspace isolation enforcement
implementation_steps: Enforce per-session auth checks for all terminal APIs and WS upgrades.
Enforce workspace ownership checks for terminal attach.
Add audit logs for terminal create/attach/kill.

security: Attempt attach with invalid session token and expect rejection.
Attempt attach to another workspace session and expect rejection.
integration: Verify authorized user can access only expected sessions.

acceptance_criteria: No unauthorized terminal session access is possible.

tickets.title: Run terminal resilience and soak validation
implementation_steps: Create soak scripts for long-lived terminal sessions.
Capture resource usage over time (CPU/memory/file descriptors).
Document findings and tune timeouts/buffers.

performance: 2-hour continuous command stream with reconnect interruptions.
manual: Verify backend remains responsive during soak.

acceptance_criteria: No critical leaks or stability regressions found in soak tests.

phases.status_reason: Paused on 2026-02-10 for UI-first execution focus.

phases.name: Security Hardening
phases.goal: Apply production-grade security controls and validate against threat model.

required_test_runs.name: security-suite
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: All automated security tests pass.

required_test_runs.name: dependency-and-image-scan
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: No unresolved critical findings; highs are triaged with mitigations.

required_test_runs.name: dast-baseline
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: No high-risk alerts remain open.

release_blockers: Any unauthenticated command execution path exists.

tickets.title: Enforce CORS, CSP, CSRF, cookie and header hardening
implementation_steps: Set strict CORS allowlist for Tailscale-served origin only.
Implement CSP, X-Frame-Options, and referrer policy headers.
Finalize CSRF checks and secure cookie policy.

security: Cross-origin request attempts from unauthorized origin fail.
CSRF token omission on POST/PUT/DELETE fails.
integration: Expected origin works with authenticated requests.

acceptance_criteria: Browser-facing attack surface is reduced with strict headers and origin controls.

tickets.title: Harden auth/session lifecycle and abuse controls
implementation_steps: Add login rate limiting, lockout/backoff policy, and optional MFA hook point.
Implement session rotation on privilege changes/login.
Add suspicious activity logging.

security: Brute force simulation triggers rate limit/lockout.
integration: Session rotation invalidates old session token.

acceptance_criteria: Auth surface is resistant to basic brute force and replay patterns.

tickets.title: Enforce safe execution defaults and high-risk mode guardrails
implementation_steps: Default remote sessions to `approvalPolicy=on-request` and workspace-write sandbox.
Implement explicit high-risk mode toggle with TTL + audit reason.
Auto-revert high-risk mode after TTL expiration.

unit: TTL expiry and auto-revert tests.
integration: High-risk mode requires explicit action and reason.
Post-TTL operations revert to safe defaults.
security: Attempt bypass of high-risk mode gate is rejected.

acceptance_criteria: Dangerous execution settings cannot be enabled silently or indefinitely.

tickets.title: Implement security-focused audit trail and retention policy
implementation_steps: Log auth events, approval decisions, high-risk mode toggles, terminal lifecycle actions.
Ensure payload redaction and log integrity metadata.
Add retention/rotation strategy for audit tables/files.

unit: Redaction tests for sensitive fields.
integration: Trigger key security actions and verify audit entries.
manual: Review audit logs for readability and forensic usefulness.

acceptance_criteria: Sensitive actions are traceable without exposing secrets.

tickets.title: Execute threat-model validation and final security signoff
implementation_steps: Create formal threat-model checklist mapped to controls.
Run automated and manual penetration test checklist.
Log findings, fixes, and residual risk acceptance.

security: OWASP Top 10 web checks relevant to this app.
Privilege escalation and workspace breakout attempts.
Approval spoofing and replay attack checks.
manual: End-to-end red team style scenario walkthrough.

acceptance_criteria: No unresolved critical/high security issues remain.

phases.status_reason: Paused on 2026-02-10 for UI-first execution focus.

phases.name: Reliability and Operations
phases.goal: Operationalize for daily use with monitoring, backup, runbooks, and controlled release.

required_test_runs.name: slo-validation
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: SLOs met: p95 turn event latency and reconnect success thresholds.

required_test_runs.name: backup-restore-drill
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Restore process reliably reconstructs metadata and service state.

required_test_runs.name: incident-drill
required_test_runs.pass_criteria: Runbook steps complete within target recovery times.

release_blockers: No runbook for app-server crash and auth lockout events.

tickets.title: Add metrics dashboards and SLO alerting
implementation_steps: Define service SLOs (latency, availability, reconnect success).
Instrument key metrics and export to dashboard backend.
Configure alerts for error spikes and restart storms.

integration: Trigger synthetic failures and verify alerts fire.
manual: Dashboard review for key workflows and bottlenecks.

acceptance_criteria: Operational health can be evaluated quickly from dashboards and alerts.

tickets.title: Implement backup, restore, and migration strategy
implementation_steps: Add automated backups for SQLite metadata store and app config.
Implement restore workflow with integrity checks.
Document migration and rollback steps for schema updates.

integration: Backup then restore to clean environment and run metadata consistency checks.
manual: Simulated accidental DB deletion recovery drill.

acceptance_criteria: Data recovery procedure is tested and repeatable.

tickets.title: Create production service management scripts (WSL + Windows)
implementation_steps: Provide service scripts for backend startup/restart (systemd user unit or pm2 in WSL).
Add Windows-side Tailscale Serve startup verification script.
Add health-check and self-heal script.

integration: Cold boot system and verify services come up in correct order.
Kill backend service and verify restart automation.

acceptance_criteria: Service lifecycle can be managed repeatably with scripts.

tickets.title: Write and validate incident response runbooks
implementation_steps: Create runbooks for auth lockout, app-server crash loop, high latency, and Tailscale path failures.
Define RTO targets and escalation paths.
Run tabletop and live drills.
deliverables: Drill result logs and action items.

manual: Execute drills and timestamp each recovery step.
Verify all runbook commands are current and executable.

acceptance_criteria: Operational incidents can be handled quickly using documented procedures.

tickets.title: Final release readiness and go-live checklist
implementation_steps: Compile final release checklist with all phase gates and unresolved risks.
Run canary period on personal daily workflow for at least 3 days.
Capture final post-canary issues and patch before declaring stable.

e2e: Daily-use scenario suite (workspace switching, long turn, approvals, terminal, reconnect).
performance: Verify p95 latency and reconnect SLOs during canary.
security: Re-run critical security smoke tests before go-live.

acceptance_criteria: Canary shows stable behavior with no P0/P1 issues.

phases.status_reason: Paused on 2026-02-10 for UI-first execution focus.
